Quote.Author: Greg Rucka
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Caucasian American Jew. These are all things that make up who I am

Quote.Author: Greg Rucka
Quote.QuoteValue: Character is made up of a variety of different things. One of those elements is gender

Quote.Author: Greg Rucka
Quote.QuoteValue: My college senior thesis was going to be on the American private investigator

Quote.Author: Greg Rutherford
Quote.QuoteValue: I do a lot of things like running hills and larger amounts of reps in the gym

Quote.Author: Greg Rutherford
Quote.QuoteValue: It's all about proving it on the track and proving to people that have different views wrong

Quote.Author: Greg Rutherford
Quote.QuoteValue: To put up with me, you have to be patient

Quote.Author: Greg Rutherford
Quote.QuoteValue: I've not received any major sponsorship deals or anything else

Quote.Author: Greg Rutherford
Quote.QuoteValue: Over the years, I've had torrid luck with things going wrong

Quote.Author: Greg Rutherford
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm excited by going 85 mph, head-first, down an ice track

Quote.Author: Greg Rutherford
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never happy to settle

Quote.Author: Greg Rutherford
Quote.QuoteValue: Ultimately, I love the sport; I love doing what I do

Quote.Author: Greg Rutherford
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always the slightly fat kid, which used to bother me quite a bit

Quote.Author: Greg Rutherford
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad is a builder, and my mum's a nurse. They're just very normal people

Quote.Author: Gregg Allman
Quote.QuoteValue: I play every show like it's my last. Fortunately, that's never turned out to be the case

Quote.Author: Gregg Allman
Quote.QuoteValue: Gotta take my puppy on the road with me, Killer

Quote.Author: Gregg Allman
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't think we would ever make enough money to pay rent by playing music

Quote.Author: Gregg Allman
Quote.QuoteValue: I got Jimmy Hall from Wet Willie and he also plays now with Hank Williams Jr

Quote.Author: Gregg Allman
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been going to the gym instead of the bar, trying to get back down to my fighting weight

Quote.Author: Gregg Allman
Quote.QuoteValue: The Beatles had just come out, and everybody had a band. It was incredible competition out there

Quote.Author: Gregg Allman
Quote.QuoteValue: There are as many ways to write songs as there are songs

Quote.Author: Gregg Allman
Quote.QuoteValue: I've come to the conclusion that I'm not supposed to be married

Quote.Author: Gregg Allman
Quote.QuoteValue: Before I got into rock n' roll, I was going to be a dentist

Quote.Author: Gregg Allman
Quote.QuoteValue: Duane Allman was the best guitar player I ever heard who didn't read a note

Quote.Author: Gregory Bateson
Quote.QuoteValue: Science, like art, religion, commerce, warfare, and even sleep, is based on presuppositions

Quote.Author: Gregory Bateson
Quote.QuoteValue: Language commonly stresses only one side of any interaction

Quote.Author: Gregory Bateson
Quote.QuoteValue: All experience is subjective

Quote.Author: Gregory Bateson
Quote.QuoteValue: Money is always transitively valued. More money is supposedly always better than less money

Quote.Author: Gregory Bateson
Quote.QuoteValue: It is impossible, in principle, to explain any pattern by invoking a single quantity

Quote.Author: Gregory Bateson
Quote.QuoteValue: Logic is a poor model of cause and effect

Quote.Author: Gregory Bateson
Quote.QuoteValue: We do not know enough about how the present will lead into the future

Quote.Author: Gregory Bateson
Quote.QuoteValue: Every move we make in fear of the next war in fact hastens it

Quote.Author: Gregory Bateson
Quote.QuoteValue: Logic can often be reversed, but the effect does not precede the cause

Quote.Author: Gregory Bateson
Quote.QuoteValue: Number is different from quantity

Quote.Author: Greta Garbo
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are blessed, you are blessed, whether you are married or single

Quote.Author: Greta Garbo
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I were supernaturally strong so I could put right everything that is wrong

Quote.Author: Greta Garbo
Quote.QuoteValue: Is there anything better than to be longing for something, when you know it is within reach?

Quote.Author: Greta Garbo
Quote.QuoteValue: If only those who dream about Hollywood knew how difficult it all is

Quote.Author: Greta Garbo
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no one who would have me - I can't cook

Quote.Author: Greta Garbo
Quote.QuoteValue: Life would be so wonderful if we only knew what to do with it

Quote.Author: Greta Garbo
Quote.QuoteValue: My talents fall within definite limitations. I am not as versatile an actress as some think

Quote.Author: Greta Garbo
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who has a continuous smile on his face conceals a toughness that is almost frightening

Quote.Author: Greta Garbo
Quote.QuoteValue: This is where I have wasted the best years of my life

Quote.Author: Greta Garbo
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be alone

Quote.Author: Gretchen Rubin
Quote.QuoteValue: If you've had something for more than six months, and it's still not repaired, it's clutter

Quote.Author: Gretchen Rubin
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my most important 'Secrets of Adulthood': Outer order contributes to inner calm

Quote.Author: Gretchen Rubin
Quote.QuoteValue: Getting paperwork under control makes me feel more in control of my life generally

Quote.Author: Gretchen Rubin
Quote.QuoteValue: Children's literature is one of my joys, and it's also my mental comfort food

Quote.Author: Gretchen Rubin
Quote.QuoteValue: Accept yourself and expect more from yourself

Quote.Author: Gretchen Rubin
Quote.QuoteValue: Working is one of the most dangerous forms of procrastination

Quote.Author: Gretchen Rubin
Quote.QuoteValue: I always feel calmer when I exercise. In fact, that's probably the main reason I exercise

Quote.Author: Gretchen Rubin
Quote.QuoteValue: I get such a buzz out of cleaning closets

Quote.Author: Gretchen Rubin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm much calmer when there's no TV or music playing in the background

Quote.Author: Gretchen Rubin
Quote.QuoteValue: In 'Happier at Home,' I write a lot about my struggle to create an unhurried atmosphere at home

Quote.Author: Grimes
Quote.QuoteValue: The most valuable live thing for me is when people look like they're having a good time

Quote.Author: Grimes
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm a bad mood, I can't go on stage and smile

Quote.Author: Grimes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very nervous, shy person

Quote.Author: Grimes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm against spending money to record

Quote.Author: Grimes
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't censor myself; it's really important for me to say how I feel

Quote.Author: Grimes
Quote.QuoteValue: I was incredibly unpopular in high school but also extremely notorious

Quote.Author: Grimes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not, like, a natural performer. It's sort of a thing that I've had to learn to do

Quote.Author: Grimes
Quote.QuoteValue: Especially with music, people want confidence

Quote.Author: Grimes
Quote.QuoteValue: Success, for me, is a song that can deliver shivers

Quote.Author: Grimes
Quote.QuoteValue: Basically, I'm really impressionable and have no sense of consistency in anything I do

Quote.Author: Grover Norquist
Quote.QuoteValue: Hypocrisy is the tribute that vice pays to virtue

Quote.Author: Grover Norquist
Quote.QuoteValue: Our goal is to shrink government to the size where we can drown it in a bathtub

Quote.Author: Grover Norquist
Quote.QuoteValue: The tax issue is the most powerful issue in American politics going back to the Tea Party

Quote.Author: Grover Norquist
Quote.QuoteValue: Compromise is moving in the right directlon more slowly than one might like

Quote.Author: Grover Norquist
Quote.QuoteValue: Obsessions turn people off

Quote.Author: Grover Norquist
Quote.QuoteValue: Being married is kind of like being a Ken-doll; you don't get to dress yourself anymore

Quote.Author: Grover Norquist
Quote.QuoteValue: The statists want to control the economy

Quote.Author: Grover Norquist
Quote.QuoteValue: My ideal citizen is the self-employed, homeschooling, IRA-owning guy with a concealed-carry permit

Quote.Author: Grover Norquist
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was younger, I thought of myself as a Nixon Republican because he was the anti-Communist

Quote.Author: Grover Norquist
Quote.QuoteValue: Not continuing a tax cut is not technically a tax increase

Quote.Author: Gugu Mbath
Quote.QuoteValue: aw - I'm interested in playing lots of different complex women

Quote.Author: Gugu Mbath
Quote.QuoteValue: aw - You have to be able to appreciate who you are

Quote.Author: Gugu Mbath
Quote.QuoteValue: aw - Speaking as a mixed-race woman, there aren't many historical stories about people like me

Quote.Author: Gugu Mbath
Quote.QuoteValue: aw - When I was nine, 'The Borrowers' was such a big series for me!

Quote.Author: Gugu Mbath
Quote.QuoteValue: aw - I think there are parts of myself in every character I play

Quote.Author: Gugu Mbath
Quote.QuoteValue: aw - I try not to define myself. Other people are going to do that for you anyway

Quote.Author: Gugu Mbath
Quote.QuoteValue: aw - I played Dorothy in 'The Wizard of Oz.' That was my first role on stage

Quote.Author: Gugu Mbath
Quote.QuoteValue: aw - In 2009, I was living in London and getting work I enjoyed

Quote.Author: Gugu Mbath
Quote.QuoteValue: aw - I feel like I learn in every project

Quote.Author: Gugu Mbath
Quote.QuoteValue: aw - I feel like my work has been incredibly diverse

Quote.Author: Guru Nanak
Quote.QuoteValue: Let no man in the world live in delusion. Without a Guru none can cross over to the other shore

Quote.Author: Guru Nanak
Quote.QuoteValue: Through shallow intellect, the mind becomes shallow, and one eats the fly, along with the sweets

Quote.Author: Guru Nanak
Quote.QuoteValue: Riches cannot be gathered without sin and evil means

Quote.Author: Guru Nanak
Quote.QuoteValue: I am neither a child, a young man, nor an ancient; nor am I of any caste

Quote.Author: Guru Nanak
Quote.QuoteValue: I bow at His Feet constantly, and pray to Him, the Guru, the True Guru, has shown me the Way

Quote.Author: Guru Nanak
Quote.QuoteValue: One cannot comprehend Him through reason, even if one reasoned for ages

Quote.Author: Guru Nanak
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not the born; how can there be either birth or death for me?

Quote.Author: Guru Nanak
Quote.QuoteValue: From its brilliancy everything is illuminated

Quote.Author: Guru Nanak
Quote.QuoteValue: Thou has a thousand eyes and yet not one eye; Thou host a thousand forms and yet not one form

Quote.Author: Guru Nanak
Quote.QuoteValue: Let God's grace be the mosque, and devotion the prayer mat. Let the Quran be the good conduct

Quote.Author: Gus Van Sant
Quote.QuoteValue: Free time keeps me going

Quote.Author: Gus Van Sant
Quote.QuoteValue: I was once a shameless, full-time dope fiend

Quote.Author: Gus Van Sant
Quote.QuoteValue: For all the boredom the straight life brings, it's not too bad

Quote.Author: Gus Van Sant
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, I think I'm pretty sentimental

Quote.Author: Gus Van Sant
Quote.QuoteValue: There's always a risk if you don't do things the way you've done things before

Quote.Author: Gus Van Sant
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm normally drawn to something I haven't done and seen before

Quote.Author: Gus Van Sant
Quote.QuoteValue: Usually people just hire me

Quote.Author: Gus Van Sant
Quote.QuoteValue: When you get to be 23, 24 or 25, you start to freeze up and become an adult

Quote.Author: Gus Van Sant
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes, the people who are helping you can drop the ball

Quote.Author: Gus Van Sant
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything's changing so fast that it's sometimes hard to keep up

Quote.Author: Gustav Mahler
Quote.QuoteValue: A symphony must be like the world. It must contain everything

Quote.Author: Gustav Mahler
Quote.QuoteValue: I am hitting my head against the walls, but the walls are giving way

Quote.Author: Gustav Mahler
Quote.QuoteValue: It should be one's sole endeavor to see everything afresh and create it anew

Quote.Author: Gustav Mahler
Quote.QuoteValue: Fortunately, something always remains to be harvested. So let us not be idle

Quote.Author: Gustav Mahler
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't let myself get carried away by my own ideas - I abandon 19 out of 20 of them every day

Quote.Author: Gustav Mahler
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't bother looking at the view - I have already composed it

Quote.Author: Gustav Mahler
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think you're boring your audience, go slower not faster

Quote.Author: Gustav Mahler
Quote.QuoteValue: It is strange how one feels drawn forward without knowing at first where one is going

Quote.Author: Gustav Mahler
Quote.QuoteValue: If a composer could say what he had to say in words he would not bother trying to say it in music

Quote.Author: Gustav Mahler
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope you will no longer accuse me of a lack of delicacy. as I now count on your understanding

Quote.Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of writing is the art of discovering what you believe

Quote.Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no truth. There is only perception

Quote.Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is a consequence and must not be a goal

Quote.Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is more humiliating than to see idiots succeed in enterprises we have failed in

Quote.Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that if one always looked at the skies, one would end up with wings

Quote.Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Exuberance is better than taste

Quote.Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Artists who seek perfection in everything are those who cannot attain it in anything

Quote.Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Poetry is as precise a thing as geometry

Quote.Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all lies, art is the least untrue

Quote.Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote.QuoteValue: The more humanity advances, the more it is degraded

Quote.Author: Guy Fieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Short of screaming-hot Thai food, everything can be suitable for kids too

Quote.Author: Guy Fieri
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter how tough the meat may be, it's going to be tender if you slice it thin enough

Quote.Author: Guy Fieri
Quote.QuoteValue: You can find tranquility, you can find party, you can find new friends. I'm a cruise convert

Quote.Author: Guy Fieri
Quote.QuoteValue: There are three people you need in life: an accountant, a fishmonger, and a bail bondsman

Quote.Author: Guy Fieri
Quote.QuoteValue: If you looked in my fridge, you'd see maybe 12 different mustards

Quote.Author: Guy Fieri
Quote.QuoteValue: I wake up in the morning thinking about food

Quote.Author: Guy Fieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people are just born to cook and talk

Quote.Author: Guy Fieri
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to eat a whole cheeseburger, just take a piece of the cheeseburger

Quote.Author: Guy Fieri
Quote.QuoteValue: Losing my sister to cancer was... That was the worst thing in the world, man

Quote.Author: Guy Fieri
Quote.QuoteValue: In Japanese, sushi does not mean raw fish. It means seasoned rice

Quote.Author: Guy Kawasaki
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have to put someone on a pedestal, put teachers. They are society's heroes

Quote.Author: Guy Kawasaki
Quote.QuoteValue: Patience is the art of concealing your impatience

Quote.Author: Guy Kawasaki
Quote.QuoteValue: Great companies start because the founders want to change the world... not make a fast buck

Quote.Author: Guy Kawasaki
Quote.QuoteValue: Evangelism is selling a dream

Quote.Author: Guy Kawasaki
Quote.QuoteValue: A good idea is about ten percent and implementation and hard work, and luck is 90 percent

Quote.Author: Guy Kawasaki
Quote.QuoteValue: Ambitious failure, magnificent failure, is a very good thing

Quote.Author: Guy Kawasaki
Quote.QuoteValue: Entrepreneurship is not for everyone

Quote.Author: Guy Kawasaki
Quote.QuoteValue: Social media allows me to pick my times for social interaction

Quote.Author: Guy Kawasaki
Quote.QuoteValue: I do have a peripatetic and active intellectual curiosity

Quote.Author: Guy Kawasaki
Quote.QuoteValue: Entitlement is the opposite of enchantment

Quote.Author: Gwen Ifill
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope springs eternal, even in politics

Quote.Author: Gwen Ifill
Quote.QuoteValue: Can't disagree with the need for a grasp of history

Quote.Author: Gwen Ifill
Quote.QuoteValue: The common agenda both sides seem to share is: Whatever works

Quote.Author: Gwen Ifill
Quote.QuoteValue: Is it unreasonable to have proof of citizenship when entering another country?

Quote.Author: Gwen Ifill
Quote.QuoteValue: On immigration, there are a lot of hurdles before anything arrives at the White House

Quote.Author: Gwen Ifill
Quote.QuoteValue: Did I say that the President's entire job is image management? Of course not

Quote.Author: Gwen Ifill
Quote.QuoteValue: Tony Blair - good thing there are not parliamentary elections in this country

Quote.Author: Gwen Ifill
Quote.QuoteValue: I got my first job by exceeding expectations

Quote.Author: Gwen Ifill
Quote.QuoteValue: Hyperbole is not easily dealt with. Usually, it collapses under its own weight

Quote.Author: Gwen Ifill
Quote.QuoteValue: My job as a reporter is not to know what I think

Quote.Author: Gwen Stefani
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is short and you've got to get the most out of it

Quote.Author: Gwen Stefani
Quote.QuoteValue: At a certain point I'm going to want to have a family

Quote.Author: Gwen Stefani
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing songs is super intimate. It's a bit like getting naked

Quote.Author: Gwen Stefani
Quote.QuoteValue: Being in a band you can wear whatever you want - it's like an excuse for Halloween every day

Quote.Author: Gwen Stefani
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything works out how it should

Quote.Author: Gwen Stefani
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have a strong sense of self-worth unless I'm doing something

Quote.Author: Gwen Stefani
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I've been able to fool a lot of people because I know I'm a dork. I'm a geek

Quote.Author: Gwen Stefani
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm lucky to not have a real job, to be able to express myself, be creative and be relevant

Quote.Author: Gwen Stefani
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be a guy, but I want to wear a lot of makeup

Quote.Author: Gwen Stefani
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you have to sacrifice your performance for high heels

Quote.Author: Gwendoline Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: I think everyone loves a slash of red lipstick

Quote.Author: Gwendoline Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: Rory McCann is an amazing actor and a very strong man

Quote.Author: Gwendoline Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know, so much of women's femininity is tied up with their hair

Quote.Author: Gwendoline Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: My father always said, 'You can do anything a man can do.'

Quote.Author: Gwendoline Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to work with Lena Headey, Alfie Allen, Charles Dance. I'd love to work with Peter Dinklage

Quote.Author: Gwendoline Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: My pseudonym is 'George R. R. Martin.' That guy's just an actor

Quote.Author: Gwendoline Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: I describe my personal style as 'mythic space horse with chocolate box tendencies.'

Quote.Author: Gwendoline Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: If I were amazing with a sword, I wouldn't care about the tender things in life

Quote.Author: Gwendoline Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole format of 'Game of Thrones' is that you just don't know what to expect

Quote.Author: Gwendoline Christie
Quote.QuoteValue: People come up to me and say, 'You look so much better in real life.'

Quote.Author: Gwyneth Paltrow
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not sure how healthy bacon is in general, but I know it's incredibly delicious

Quote.Author: Gwyneth Paltrow
Quote.QuoteValue: My father, he was like the rock, the guy you went to with every problem

Quote.Author: Gwyneth Paltrow
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very highly developed sense of denial

Quote.Author: Gwyneth Paltrow
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty, to me is about being comfortable in your own skin

Quote.Author: Gwyneth Paltrow
Quote.QuoteValue: The older I get, the more open-minded I get, the less judgmental I get

Quote.Author: Gwyneth Paltrow
Quote.QuoteValue: The Jewish part of me is superstitious

Quote.Author: Gwyneth Paltrow
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes when things you love get really commercial, you end up feeling betrayed by it

Quote.Author: Gwyneth Paltrow
Quote.QuoteValue: Because I was newly pregnant, I was sick as a dog, yet I knew all my lines from a year before

Quote.Author: Gwyneth Paltrow
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to avoid barbecue potato chips. They're my weakness

Quote.Author: Gwyneth Paltrow
Quote.QuoteValue: When I pass a flowering zucchini plant in a garden, my heart skips a beat

Quote.Author: Gyorgy Ligeti
Quote.QuoteValue: If you come from Paris to Budapest you think you are in Moscow

Quote.Author: Gyorgy Ligeti
Quote.QuoteValue: But if you go from Moscow to Budapest you think you are in Paris

Quote.Author: Gyorgy Ligeti
Quote.QuoteValue: My grandfather was not a musician but he was an artist - a painter, a decorative painter

Quote.Author: Gyorgy Ligeti
Quote.QuoteValue: I listen to all kinds of music - new music, old music, music of my colleagues, everything

Quote.Author: Gyorgy Ligeti
Quote.QuoteValue: Stravinsky used Mother Goose. He was influenced by Mother Goose, indirectly, but very beautifully

Quote.Author: Gyorgy Ligeti
Quote.QuoteValue: But I do not want to use Hungarian verses for British people

Quote.Author: Gyorgy Ligeti
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't read such boring things. Life is too short

Quote.Author: Gyorgy Ligeti
Quote.QuoteValue: In January 1944 I was called up by the Forced Labor Service, but I deserted on October 10, 1944

Quote.Author: Gyorgy Ligeti
Quote.QuoteValue: I lived under the Nazis and under the Communists

Quote.Author: Gyorgy Ligeti
Quote.QuoteValue: I know already the music I will write. But the words? I have not yet decided

Quote.Author: H. Rap Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: They cannot divide us by saying that you're middle class or you're lower class

Quote.Author: H. Rap Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: And understand: class differences will not save you

Quote.Author: H. Rap Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I say violence is necessary. It is as American as cherry pie

Quote.Author: H. Rap Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Revolution comes when human beings set out to correct decadent institutions

Quote.Author: H. Rap Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: When you understand your obligations to God then you can understand your obligations to society

Quote.Author: H. Rap Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to stop dividing yourselves. You got to organize

Quote.Author: H. Rap Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, politics IS war without bloodshed; and war is an extension of those politics

Quote.Author: H. Rap Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: See, justice is a joke in this country, and it stinks of its hypocricy

Quote.Author: H. Rap Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: See, it's no in between: you're either free or you're a slave

Quote.Author: H. Rap Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the lies that we tell ourselves is that we're making progress; but Huey's chair's empty

Quote.Author: Haile Gebrselassie
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't done a marathon for a long time. So we'll see. I will need good luck

Quote.Author: Haile Gebrselassie
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to change a lot of things before I become a good marathon runner

Quote.Author: Haile Gebrselassie
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to experience New York, to look up and see buildings

Quote.Author: Haile Gebrselassie
Quote.QuoteValue: My father didn't think running was sensible. He told me running is just wasting time

Quote.Author: Haile Gebrselassie
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're planning only to make money and nothing else, you'll be broke

Quote.Author: Haile Gebrselassie
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never satisfied

Quote.Author: Haile Gebrselassie
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you have commitment, you need the discipline and hard work to get you there

Quote.Author: Haile Gebrselassie
Quote.QuoteValue: I think if you come first with a new world record, that is the best

Quote.Author: Haile Gebrselassie
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to run to school, 10k every day. And this at altitude, perfect preparation, really

Quote.Author: Haile Gebrselassie
Quote.QuoteValue: When you promise something, you must fulfill it

Quote.Author: Hailee Steinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom taught me to live by the three p's: to always be passionate, persistent, and prepared

Quote.Author: Hailee Steinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything I do now is a first

Quote.Author: Hailee Steinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was 13, I looked like I could play 16, and I wasn't mature enough to play 16

Quote.Author: Hailee Steinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard not to love everything Prada does

Quote.Author: Hailee Steinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: It needs to be said and heard: it's OK to be who you are

Quote.Author: Hailee Steinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Every girl wishes she was Juliet in some version of their life

Quote.Author: Hailee Steinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea of revenge coming from a 14-year-old girl isn't, you know, exactly right

Quote.Author: Hailee Steinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I was just another girl

Quote.Author: Hailee Steinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Facebook is my life

Quote.Author: Hailee Steinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the film route and I'm gong to try my hardest to stay on it

Quote.Author: Hakeem Olajuwon
Quote.QuoteValue: My type of basketball is about how to create space, how to maneuver, how to get your shot off

Quote.Author: Hakeem Olajuwon
Quote.QuoteValue: God comes first. Paradise is not cheap

Quote.Author: Hakeem Olajuwon
Quote.QuoteValue: I always keep a ball in the car. You never know

Quote.Author: Hakeem Olajuwon
Quote.QuoteValue: I remember at the 1996 Olympics in Atlanta, Shaq always wanted me to show him steps over and over

Quote.Author: Hakeem Olajuwon
Quote.QuoteValue: My background playing soccer gave me a natural advantage over many of the American-born players

Quote.Author: Hakeem Olajuwon
Quote.QuoteValue: Basketball is in my blood. It is my obligation to try

Quote.Author: Hakeem Olajuwon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the kind of person who always wants more

Quote.Author: Hakeem Olajuwon
Quote.QuoteValue: The key to fashion is, you don't want to look like you're trying. You've gotta be natural

Quote.Author: Hakeem Olajuwon
Quote.QuoteValue: I've now been in this country for thirteen years, since I was seventeen. So this is my second home

Quote.Author: Hakeem Olajuwon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm shy, but sometimes my voice is so clear and strong

Quote.Author: Hal Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: It's better to waste money, than it is to waste time. You can always get more money

Quote.Author: Hal Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I play guitar like a frustrated drummer

Quote.Author: Hal Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: Jerry Springer' is just kind of the chubby, redneck version of throwing Christians to the lions

Quote.Author: Hal Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to be as ignorant about things as I can

Quote.Author: Hal Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who still supports George Bush would still let Michael Jackson babysit their kids

Quote.Author: Hal Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: If I have anything, it's tenacity

Quote.Author: Hal Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: Political and social change is always a stagger-step process

Quote.Author: Hal Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth be told, ginormous portions have become a pet peeve of mine

Quote.Author: Hal Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: It's better to waste money than time. You can always get more money

Quote.Author: Hal Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been doing stand-up since I was 15 years old

Quote.Author: Halle Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: I spent a lot of time with a crown on my head

Quote.Author: Halle Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: My whole life I've had the fear that I was going to be abandoned

Quote.Author: Halle Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's always best to be who you are

Quote.Author: Halle Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: I carried my Oscar to bed with me. My first and only three-way happened that night

Quote.Author: Halle Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: I like Doritos. I'm usually watching 'The Biggest Loser' eating Doritos

Quote.Author: Halle Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just going to live my life and be who I am

Quote.Author: Halle Berry
Quote.QuoteValue: A person's self-esteem has nothing to do with how she looks
